TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FaultException extends System.ServiceModel.CommunicationException

summary.span: 表示 SOAP 錯誤。

span.span: Represents a SOAP fault.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服務中，使用 類別建立一個不具型別的錯誤，將它傳回至用戶端以進行偵錯之用。In a service, use the class to create an untyped fault to return to the client for debugging purposes. 在用戶端攔截 物件來處理未知或一般錯誤，例如將 屬性設為 `true` 的服務所傳回的錯誤。In a client, catch objects to handle unknown or generic faults, such as those returned by a service with the property set to `true`. 因為 延伸了 ，請記得在攔截 物件之前先攔截 物件，才能分別攔截它們。Because extends , remember to catch any objects prior to catching objects if you want to catch them separately. > [!NOTE] > 雙工服務亦可攔截與雙工用戶端互動時，所傳回的 物件。Duplex services can also catch objects returned from their interaction with a duplex client. 一般而言，若您決定用戶端需要錯誤資訊，則強烈建議您使用 來設計服務，以對所有錯誤情況傳回強型別 SOAP 錯誤 (以及未管理例外狀況物件)。In general, it is strongly recommended that you use the to design your services to return strongly-typed SOAP faults (and not managed exception objects) for all fault cases in which you decide the client requires fault information. 但遇到下列狀況時，請使用 ︰However, use the in the following situations: - 從服務傳送 SOAP 錯誤以進行偵錯。To send SOAP faults from a service for debugging purposes. - 若該錯誤不是服務合約的一部分時，在用戶端攔截 SOAP 錯誤。To catch SOAP faults on a client when the faults are not part of the service contract. 當您想將該字串傳給建構函式，以及讓用戶端結取該字串時 (藉由呼叫 方法)，擲回 物件。Throw objects when you want the string to be passed to the constructor and retrieved by the client by calling the method. 若您指定一個 型別的錯誤合約，且型別參數為 ，則字串值可以 屬性取得，而不是呼叫 。If you specify a fault contract of type where the type parameter is , the string value is available as the property and not by calling . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[指定與處理合約和服務中的錯誤](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。For details, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 try/catch 區塊來攔截並處理從服務擲回的 物件。The following code example shows the use of a try/catch block to catch and handle objects thrown from a service. 當服務應用程式開啟偵錯時，常會發生此情況。This often occurs when debugging is turned on in the service application. [!code-csharp[IErrorHandler#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[IErrorHandler#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/vb/client.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.ServiceModel.FaultException CreateFault (System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault messageFault, params Type[] faultDetailTypes);
.method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.FaultException CreateFault(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageFault messageFault, class System.Type[] faultDetailTypes) cil managed
public: static System::ServiceModel::FaultException ^ CreateFault(System::ServiceModel::Channels::MessageFault ^ messageFault, ... cli::array <Type ^> ^ faultDetailTypes);

param.name: messageFault
param.span: 包含預設 SOAP 錯誤資訊的訊息錯誤。

span.span: The message fault that contains default SOAP fault information.

param.name: faultDetailTypes
param.span: 包含錯誤細節的型別陣列。

span.span: An array of types that contains fault details.

summary.span: 從指定的訊息錯誤與一個詳細型別陣列，傳回一個 物件。

span.span: Returns a object from the specified message fault and an array of detail types.

returns.span: 物件，您可擲回此物件，表示已收到一個 SOAP 錯誤訊息。

span.span: A object that you can throw to indicate that a SOAP fault message was received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `faultDetailTypes` 參數包含候選細節型別。The `faultDetailTypes` parameter contains candidate detail types. 若有任何 `faultDetailTypes` 具有一個符合 `messageFault` 參數的結構描述，便會傳回一個 ，其中的型別參數就是該符合的候選型別。If any of the `faultDetailTypes` has a schema that matches the `messageFault` parameter, a is returned where the type parameter is the matching candidate type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `faultDetailTypes` 參數包含候選細節型別。The `faultDetailTypes` parameter contains candidate detail types. 若有任何 `faultDetailTypes` 具有一個符合 `messageFault` 參數的結構描述，便會傳回一個 ，其中的型別參數就是該符合的候選型別。If any of the `faultDetailTypes` has a schema that matches the `messageFault` parameter, a is returned where the type parameter is the matching candidate type.

span.span: The in-memory representation of a SOAP fault that can be passed to to create a message that contains a fault.

returns.span: 對錯誤訊息造成的 物件而言，這個 物件就是到達的錯誤。

span.span: For objects that result from fault messages, this object is the fault that arrives.
